Armor manufacturers often protect their secrets by installing self-destructing anti-tamper chips into the armor logic systems.  A Smuggler with the right know-how can bypass these defenses and integrate complex armor improvements into the stabilizer systems.

column3: but sometimes the best way to stay alive is to play dead.  More than one Smuggler has made a successful run because they acted like their ship was scrap or a grazing shot was fatal.  The oldest trick in the book.

name: combat_smuggler_combat_02

name: combat_smuggler_combat_03

column3: honor has to take a back seat to survival.  Shooting for the knees or the groin might not be honorable
column4: but it'll give you the chance to get out of harm's way.  Using the /lowblow command
column5: you can knock your opponent down for a little while.

name: combat_smuggler_combat_04

column3: but will leave you open for a counterattack.  Make sure those shots count.

Other terminals may be sliceable as well.
